item.description: We will meet at 4:00 to set up events. Please bring your own picnic food and a dessert or snack to share with others. Chocolate is always good Adriane likes peanut butter with hers! If you have a game you would like to share bring it along.
item.how_to_find_us: When you enter the park, do not go to the Fort, but turn left up the hill and look for a row of trees on the right hand side. We will be parked there.
item.why: Show your talent in volleyball, croquette, badminton, or sunbathing. You can win a spectacular prize like in first grade.
item.name: It's All Fun and Games
